/* eslint-disable import/no-anonymous-default-export */import axios from'./axiosConfig.ts';axios.defaults.baseURL="http://localhost:5171";// const apiUrl = "http://localhost:5171"
export default{getTasks:async()=>{const result=await axios.get("/items");return result.data;},addTask:async name=>{console.log('addTask',name);try{const result=await axios.post("/items",{"Name":name});return result.data;}catch(error){console.error(error);}},setCompleted:async(id,isComplete)=>{console.log('setCompleted',{id,isComplete});await axios.put("/items/".concat(id,"?IsComplete=").concat(isComplete));return{};},deleteTask:async id=>{console.log('deleteTask');await axios.delete("/items/".concat(id));}};
